alert.note: Alert for Rutherford (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:29PM CDT until May 05 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RUTHERFORD COUNTY... At 428 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles southwest of Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Eagleville and Rockvale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 80 and 85. Interstate 840 between mile markers 46 and 52. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
